content: What a beautifully written, heart-expanding piece! Thank you for writing it, for speaking to so many of us who sometimes wonder, “why bother? It’s all been said, sung, done before…and who’s really going to care if I never create anything ever again? The world will still turn…” We create because it heals us, balances us. We are pure creation: we are both nouns and verbs. Gratitude to you, Shreya…
